casebody.data:
STATE of Louisiana
v.
Christopher WATSON NO. 2018-KH-2080 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 18, 2019

WRIT NOT CONSIDERED. Petitioner has not demonstrated that he sought review in the court(s) below before filing in this Court nor shown the "extraordinary *286circumstances" that would justify bypassing that level of review. La.S.Ct.R. X § 5(b).
